item.title: [Current Project] Understanding the effects of different uncertainty sources on WRF-Hydro modeling on Oʻahu
item.description: (This is the third topic of my Ph.D. dissertation.) Current status: Learning and practicing sensitivity analysis with WRF-Hydro Goals Simulation from hydrological models are affected by the input data and model parameters. Understanding the major sources of uncertainties is critical to support model calibration, validation and uncertainty reduction. In this study, I will apply the updated sub-daily rainfall to the WRF-Hydro on Oʻahu and conduct sensitivity analysis. In addition, the sensitivity of model parameters that stand for different watershed characteristics (e.
